snippet.title: How To Build Muscle Fast
snippet.description:
How To Build Muscle Fast

This is just my advice on what I believe to be the best way to build muscle as fast as possible.

My recommended workout plan:

5 days per week.

A split that looks like this:

Day 1.
Chest:
Bench press
Shoulder Press
Incline dumbbell press (30 degrees)
Tricep scull crushers with a Z bar or EZ bar or whatever you want to call it
Tricep rope extensions
(Could add in an extra shoulder exercise if you want)

Day 2.
Back:
Deadlift
Weighted pull ups (if you can, otherwise just bodyweight)
Barbell Bent over rows
Bar Curls either straight bar or Z/EZ bar
Dumbbell concentration curls
(Could add in a rear delt exercise if you want)

Day 3.
Legs:
Squats
Lunges (weighted if you can)
Some hamstring curl
Some leg extension
Some calf raise

And then just keep this as a rolling schedual so on day 4 you start back over with chest and so on.

This could then of course also just be a three day per week workout plan if you don't have the time or feel like doing five days per week.

CONTACT: halldenkalle@gmail.com


INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/kallehallden/

Computer: Macbook Pro - https://amzn.to/2GX54SU


Camera Gear:

Panasonic GH5 - https://amzn.to/2Nr09L2

MAIN LENS:  Lumix 12-35mm - https://amzn.to/2tzgJzp

DRONE: DJI Mavic Air - https://amzn.to/2NqkQa1

Secondary Lens: Panasonic 25mm - https://amzn.to/2UcTA1e

Secondary Lens: Olympus 45mm - https://amzn.to/2Ebp5SV

Zoom Lens: Panasonic 100-300mm - https://amzn.to/2U3UH3j

Monitor: AOC 27” - https://amzn.to/2U6hF9Z

Song: 
Here - Ikson
https://soundcloud.com/ikson
tags: how to build muscle for skinny guys
how to build muscle as a teenager
how to build muscle as a ectomorph
how to build muscle as a beginner
how long does it take to build muscle
You have no excuse not to do this.
